long_description: The wireless JBL Charge Portable Speaker delivers unsurpassed portable audio performance from your mobile devices and tablets for more than 12 hrs. of playback time from its rechargeable battery. Bluetooth(R) streaming and 6000mAh lithium-ion battery. JBL sound with two 5W high-performance drivers and a built-in bass port. Recharges your external devices while in use. Durable, portable design. AUX connection. JBL Charge Portable Speaker comes with a carry case.
short_description: The wireless JBL Charge Portable Speaker delivers unsurpassed portable audio performance from your mobile devices and tablets for more than 12 hrs. of playback time from its rechargeable battery.
